page.title: 11Torbay Hospital
page.content: My mum is a nurse at the hospital. She works on the Casualty Ward. She has a brown uniform and the other nurses wear blue. There are many accidents in Torbay during the summer months when the tourists come. Sometimes you have to wait a long time for an operation during the summer. Perhaps you would have it in the autumn when the tourists are not here. The hospital has been made bigger recently. They knocked down half of a building and built a huge new section with a swimming pool. The mothers have their babies here. They have also built a new section for children who need to have stitches and for people who need to have operations.
